name: Selenium ide project
'on':
  push:
    branches:
      - main
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v3
      - name: Setup dotNet
        uses: actions/setup-dotnet@v3
        with:
          dotnet-version: 6.0.x
      - name: Install NuGet packages
        run: dotnet restore
      - name: Build the test project
        run: dotnet build --no-restore
      - name: Run tests
        run: dotnet test
